llm_res.rule: transferFrom function should return true on success.
The `approve` function should return a boolean value indicating the success of the operation.
allowance function should return the amount which spender is still allowed to withdraw from owner.
symbol - Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
